definition: aspirin (loanword) (variant of 阿司匹林[a1 si1 pi3 lin2])
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
classifier for horses, mules etc/Taiwan pr. [pi1]/ordinary person/classifier for cloth: bolt/horsepower
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)

sentences.english: She took an aspirin to relieve her headache.
sentences.chinese: 她吃了一片阿斯匹林以解頭痛。

sentences.english: The doctor asked him to take an aspirin after each meal.
sentences.chinese: 醫生叫他每頓飯後喫一粒阿斯匹林。

sentences.english: I will take the Aspirin then. And have you a small first-aid kit?
sentences.chinese: 那麼我就喫阿斯匹林吧，而你有小型急救包嗎？

sentences.english: Suitable for children with asthma who are sensitive to aspirin and NSAIDs.
sentences.chinese: 有哮喘而不能使用阿斯匹林和非留體抗炎藥的兒童。

sentences.english: You should take an aspirin , and have a good sleep.
sentences.chinese: 你應該喫一片阿斯匹林，然後好好睡一覺。

sentences.english: Also because the aspirin may suppress the spontaneous ear sound launch.
sentences.chinese: 又因爲阿斯匹林可以抑制自發性耳聲發射。

sentences.english: The present of aspirin interferes with the determination of persantine content.
sentences.chinese: 因阿斯匹林的存在使潘生丁的含量測定受到干擾。

sentences.english: Therefore, aspirin and pneumatic compression devices are acceptable for TKA patients.
sentences.chinese: 因此，阿斯匹林和氣動加壓靴可用於TKA患者。

sentences.english: Non-aspirin fever reducers can be used to reduce a fever.
sentences.chinese: 不含阿斯匹林的解熱藥可以用來退燒。

sentences.english: It's better than coffee and aspirin. Wanna try?
sentences.chinese: 比喝咖啡喫阿斯匹林有用多了，想試試嗎？

sentences.english: Make a paste with two aspirin and water and use as a facial mask.
sentences.chinese: 將二片阿斯匹林和水做成糊狀物，並用作面膜。

sentences.english: Drugs are classified into groups. Aspirin belongs to the classification of nonprescription drugs.
sentences.chinese: 藥被分成不同的組，阿斯匹林屬於非處方藥品。

sentences.english: Dissolve a few aspirin in a bit of water then rub into the stain.
sentences.chinese: 將少許阿斯匹林溶於少量水中，然後揉搓到汗漬上。

sentences.english: You should go home and rest and take an aspirin.
sentences.chinese: 你應該回家休息，喫片阿斯匹林。

sentences.english: They found that a small amount of aspirin suppressed the way the cells form tubes.
sentences.chinese: 他們發現少量的阿斯匹林的細胞形態壓抑。

definition: Ibuprofen or Nurofen/also called 異丁苯丙酸|异丁苯丙酸
to take medicine orally/oral (contraceptive etc)/to say that one is convinced
diclofenac sodium, a non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug used to reduce swelling and as painkiller/also called voltaren 扶他林
